Klasse UserAnswerDTO

java.lang.Object
quizlogic.DataTransportObject
quizlogic.dto.UserAnswerDTO
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class UserAnswerDTO extends DataTransportObject
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a user's answer selection in a quiz session.

This DTO captures the relationship between a user's quiz session, a specific question, and the answer they selected, along with metadata about whether their selection was correct.

Each user answer contains:

  • The quiz session ID this answer belongs to
  • The question ID that was answered
  • The answer ID that was selected
  • Whether this answer was selected by the user
  • Whether the selected answer was correct

This class extends DataTransportObject for consistent ID management and validation handling across the application.

User answers are used for tracking quiz progress, calculating scores, and providing feedback to users about their performance.

Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios

  • Konstruktordetails

    • UserAnswerDTO

      public UserAnswerDTO()
      Default constructor for creating a new user answer.

      Initializes with default values:

      • isSelected = false
      • isCorrect = false
      • All ID fields remain at their default values (0)

    • UserAnswerDTO

      public UserAnswerDTO(int id)
      Constructor for creating a user answer representing an existing persisted record.

      Initializes with default boolean values (false for both isSelected and isCorrect). The provided ID indicates this user answer already exists in persistent storage.

      Parameter:
      id - the unique identifier of an existing user answer record

    • UserAnswerDTO

      public UserAnswerDTO(int quizSessionId, int questionId, int answerId, boolean isSelected, boolean isCorrect)
      Constructor for creating a complete user answer with all field values.

      Creates a new user answer (ID = -1) with all the provided field values.

      Parameter:
      quizSessionId - the ID of the quiz session this answer belongs to
      questionId - the ID of the question that was answered
      answerId - the ID of the answer that was selected
      isSelected - true if this answer was selected by the user
      isCorrect - true if the selected answer was correct

    • contentEquals

      protected boolean contentEquals(DataTransportObject other)
      Compares the content of this UserAnswerDTO to another DTO for equality.

      Used when both entities are new and have no assigned ID. Compares all content fields: quizSessionId, questionId, answerId, isSelected, and isCorrect.

      Angegeben von:
      contentEquals in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Parameter:
      other - another DataTransportObject to compare against
      Gibt zurück:
      true if all content fields match, false otherwise

    • contentHashCode

      protected int contentHashCode()
      Computes a hash code based on the user answer's content.

      Used when the user answer is a new entity with no ID. Hash is computed from all content fields: quizSessionId, questionId, answerId, isSelected, and isCorrect.

      Angegeben von:
      contentHashCode in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Gibt zurück:
      hash code from all content fields

    • getContentString

      protected String getContentString()
      Returns a string summary of this user answer's content for debugging/logging purposes.
      Angegeben von:
      getContentString in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Gibt zurück:
      String in the format: sessionId=..., questionId=..., answerId=..., selected=..., correct=...

    • validate

      protected void validate()
      Validates that the user answer has valid data.
      • Quiz session ID must be greater than 0
      • Question ID must be greater than 0
      • Answer ID must be greater than 0
      Angegeben von:
      validate in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails

    • getSelectedAnswerId

      public int getSelectedAnswerId()
      Gets the ID of the answer that was selected by the user.

      This is an alias method for getAnswerId().

      Gibt zurück:
      the selected answer ID

    • setSelectedAnswerId

      public void setSelectedAnswerId(int selectedAnswerId)
      Sets the ID of the answer selected by the user and marks it as selected.

      This is a convenience method that sets both the answerId and marks isSelected as true in a single operation.

      Parameter:
      selectedAnswerId - the ID of the answer that was selected
